<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> BUSINESS AVIATION NEWSLETTER July 2018 CUSTOMER SUPPORT MANAGER REALIGNMENT ENHANCES CUSTOMER CONNECTIONS Honeywell Customer and Product Support has realigned Customer Support Managers (CSM) in the Americas to better serve operators. Operators who have newly assigned CSM were notified by email. Our Direct Access app has CSM and field service engineer contact information...
DIRECT ACCESS <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/direct-access]]> Field service engineer jumps in to serve customers In a previous life, Mitch Eldridge was a U.S. Navy search and rescue swimmer, trained to jump out of helicopters to save downed seamen. Today, as a senior field support engineer, he jumps in feet to solve problems for customers...
